body: For some reason i can't reply to your last message, anyway -  first, try to connect the data and case name to this component (load probes from project): [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/J17TP1ZnHTfnSIjRnVomNcM4W173sxek24QAcGeReqN6I0bg87WmT4LzsS0hevj9PzXwppA2QvzHeuLJkw8HjkHC6jBvWfcR/1.jpg)you have to connect the case name and not the data itself, and the field name. that will take you one step further and you'll be stuck with the rest of us. צרת רבים נחמת טפשים
